flag.name: wxLC_LIST
flag.description: Multicolumn list view, with optional small icons. Columns are computed automatically, i.e. you don't set columns as in wxLC_REPORT. In other words, the list wraps, unlike a wxListBox.

flag.name: wxLC_REPORT
flag.description: Single or multicolumn report view, with optional header.

flag.name: wxLC_VIRTUAL
flag.description: The application provides items text on demand. May only be used with wxLC_REPORT.

flag.name: wxLC_ICON
flag.description: Large icon view, with optional labels.

flag.name: wxLC_SMALL_ICON
flag.description: Small icon view, with optional labels.

flag.name: wxLC_ALIGN_TOP
flag.description: Icons align to the top. Win32 default, Win32 only.

flag.name: wxLC_EDIT_LABELS
flag.description: Labels are editable: the application will be notified when editing starts.

flag.name: wxLC_SORT_ASCENDING
flag.description: Sort in ascending order. (You must still supply a comparison callback in wxListCtrl::SortItems.)

flag.name: wxLC_SORT_DESCENDING
flag.description: Sort in descending order. (You must still supply a comparison callback in wxListCtrl::SortItems.)

flag.name: wxLC_HRULES
flag.description: Draws light horizontal rules between rows in report mode.

flag.name: wxLC_VRULES
flag.description: Draws light vertical rules between columns in report mode.

type.name: EVT_LIST_BEGIN_DRAG
type.description: Begin dragging with the left mouse button. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_BEGIN_DRAG event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_BEGIN_RDRAG
type.description: Begin dragging with the right mouse button. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_BEGIN_RDRAG event type.

type.name: EVT_BEGIN_LABEL_EDIT
type.description: Begin editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto(). Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_BEGIN_LABEL_EDIT event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_END_LABEL_EDIT
type.description: Finish editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto(). Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_END_LABEL_EDIT event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_DELETE_ITEM
type.description: An item was deleted. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_DELETE_ITEM event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_DELETE_ALL_ITEMS
type.description: All items were deleted. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_DELETE_ALL_ITEMS event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_ITEM_SELECTED
type.description: The item has been selected. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_SELECTED event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_ITEM_DESELECTED
type.description: The item has been deselected. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_DESELECTED event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_ITEM_ACTIVATED
type.description: The item has been activated (ENTER or double click). Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_ACTIVATED event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_ITEM_FOCUSED
type.description: The currently focused item has changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_FOCUSED event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_ITEM_MIDDLE_CLICK
type.description: The middle mouse button has been clicked on an item. This is only supported by the generic control. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_MIDDLE_CLICK event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_ITEM_RIGHT_CLICK
type.description: The right mouse button has been clicked on an item. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_RIGHT_CLICK event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_KEY_DOWN
type.description: A key has been pressed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_KEY_DOWN event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_INSERT_ITEM
type.description: An item has been inserted. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_INSERT_ITEM event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_COL_CLICK
type.description: A column (m_col) has been left-clicked. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_COL_CLICK event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_COL_RIGHT_CLICK
type.description: A column (m_col) has been right-clicked. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_COL_RIGHT_CLICK event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_COL_BEGIN_DRAG
type.description: The user started resizing a column - can be vetoed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_COL_BEGIN_DRAG event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_COL_DRAGGING
type.description: The divider between columns is being dragged. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_COL_DRAGGING event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_COL_END_DRAG
type.description: A column has been resized by the user. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_COL_END_DRAG event type.

type.name: EVT_LIST_CACHE_HINT
type.description: Prepare cache for a virtual list control. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_CACHE_HINT event type.

listcolfmt.name: align
listcolfmt.description: The alignment for the item. Can be one of wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT, wxLIST_FORMAT_RIGHT or wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTRE.

int.name: image
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item in the 'small' image list.

string.name: label
string.description: The text label for the item.

style.name: state
style.description: The item state. Can be any combination of the following values:

listcolfmt.name: align
listcolfmt.description: The alignment for the item. Can be one of wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT, wxLIST_FORMAT_RIGHT or wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTRE.

colour.name: bg
colour.description: The background color for the item.

colour.label: Text colour
colour.description: The text colour for the item.

bitmap.description: Add a bitmap to the (normal) wxImageList associated with the wxListCtrl parent and associate it with this item. If the imagelist is not defined it will be created implicitly.

bitmap.name: bitmap-small
bitmap.description: Add a bitmap in the 'small' wxImageList associated with the wxListCtrl parent and associate it with this item. If the 'small' imagelist is not defined it will be created implicitly.

int.name: image
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item in the (normal) image list.

int.name: image-small
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item in the 'small' image list.

int.name: data
int.description: The client data for the item.
